Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my subscription before it ended but it seems like it did not go through. please give me my money back. i never make a mistake like this and I always remember to end my subscriptions.

I dont use CANVA account, havent used not 1 times. Can I have my money back and end my subscription??      I ave couple of subscriptions and cant remind everything without email reminder. please  make refund and end my subscription!

Thank you

Kindly help me. Thank you.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, I took advantage of your free subscription offer. I did not plan to extend it as I no longer use your program. Unfortunately, your e-mail reminding you about the end of the trial period ended up in spam, so I was not reminded of the possibility of canceling the subscription before charging the fee. I do not need to use paid services, therefore I would ask for a refund. The subscription has already been canceled.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled today knowing that my free trial ended today, but you already billed me.  Please refund.  Trial has been cancelled.  Thanks!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Time got ahead of me and I forgot to cancel my subscription before the free trial ended. So I would like to request a refund.

What do you need help with ?: Please contact me as soon as possible when registering for a pro subscription It is said that the pro subscription can be canceled before the end of the trial period, and I do not see where it can be done. I'm already informing you that I'm not going to pay for the Pro appointment and I want to cancel it, just like I updated two days ago and asked them to get back to me. According to the Consumer Protection Law, you must make the cancellation of the subscription accessible and not make it difficult for users, especially in light of the fact that your first promise to subscribers was that the subscription could be canceled before the trial period ends, and I will even receive a reminder. That's just why I entered my credit. Cancel my subscription! Get back to me. urgent!!
